Reproduce the tutorial analysis at https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/variant-analysis/tutorials/mapping-by-sequencing/tutorial.html

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Mapping and molecular identification of phenotype-causing mutations](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/variant-analysis/tutorials/mapping-by-sequencing/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
